_description: Working legal tag template for OSDU record lifecycle workflow
_usage: Copy this structure and modify the values with your specific requirements
_notes: Replace 'your-tag-name' with a unique identifier (avoid spaces)
Update expiration_date to appropriate future date
Modify description to reflect your specific use case
All fields shown are required for successful creation
_example_mcp_call: legaltag_create(name='your-tag-name', description='Your description', country_of_origin=['US'], contract_id='YOUR-CONTRACT-ID', security_classification='Public', personal_data='No Personal Data', export_classification='EAR99', data_type='Public Domain Data', expiration_date='2025-12-31')

template.name: public-usa-workflow-test-YYYYMMDD
template.description: Legal tag for OSDU MCP workflow demonstration and testing

validation_notes.name: Must be unique across partition. Include timestamp (YYYYMMDD) to ensure uniqueness
validation_notes.country_of_origin: Must be valid ISO country codes (e.g., 'US', 'GB', 'CA')
validation_notes.contract_id: Required field, use meaningful identifier for your organization
validation_notes.expiration_date: Must be future date in YYYY-MM-DD format
validation_notes.description: Should clearly indicate purpose and scope of data usage

common_errors: Name already exists: Use timestamp or UUID to ensure uniqueness
Invalid country code: Use 2-letter ISO codes (US, not USA)
Missing originator: Some environments require 'originator' field
Expired date: Must be in the future
